name: Everything Black
description: An experimental style trying to add as many sites as possible that I frequent to make a dark skinned theme. Varying degrees of finish.

user.name: Lillies
user.about: all donations go towards maintaining irowiki.org

additional_info: For some reason I can no longer update this style, use this google doc and copy/paste this into the import styles option. sites included: medium.com nytimes.com npr.org independent.co.uk theguardian.com sciencealert.com sacbee.com kqed.org deadspin.com sfchronicle.com qz.com sfgate.com nbcnews.com bloomberg.com calmatters.org nature.com dev.opera.com rollingstone.com sass.logdown.com washingtonpost.com businessinsider.de businessinsider.com time.com and more
